original_text: But then he decided what to do. He thought, “I will pull down the building where I now store my food. Then I will build a bigger place to store it all, as well as everything else that is mine.
korean_text: 또 이르되 내가 이렇게 하리라 내 곳간을 헐고 더 크게 짓고 내 모든 곡식과 물건을 거기 쌓아 두리라

sentences.original_text: But then he decided what to do.
I will pull down the building
where I now store my food.
Then I will build a bigger place
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 나는 더 큰 장소를 지을 것이다

sentences.original_text: as well as everything else that is mine.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 것인 다른 모든 것들도 마찬가지로.
